cause.description:
The Caylee's Hope Foundation was founded in 2005 after four year old, Caylee Marie Cepero was diagnosed and passed from AML, a form of cancer typically found in Adults.
The mission of the Caylee's Hope Foundation is to raise awareness about Childhood Cancers and their causes, awareness about prevention and early detection and raising funds to support research both for environmental causes and cures. Please visit http://www.cayleeshope.com/ and make donations and learn more about Caylee's Hope. Help Caylee's mom keep her promise.
1. Early detection about Childhood Cancers
2. Prevention of Childhood Cancers
3. Awareness of Childhood Cancers
cause.mission: The mission of the Caylee's Hope Foundation is to raise awareness about Childhood Cancers.
cause.name: The Caylee's Hope Foundation
